backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1702 Queen Street East

noticeDescription:
NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto’s real estate disposal By-law, on October 24, 2023 the City-owned parcel of land located immediately west of Penny Lane and immediately north of 1702 Queen Street East, legally described as Part of Lots Pt Lane Pl 435E – Registered Plan 435E, City of Toronto was declared surplus. The property has a total area of approximately 69.6 m2 (749.17 ft2).  The City proposes that the intended manner of disposal is to be by way of offer to purchase from the abutting owner.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Allan Mak, Property Officer, Tel: 416-392-8159, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until December 20th, 2023.
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1702 Queen Street East
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
